SearchListSpec.Name: MIMED department Search
SearchListSpec.Description: A search list for locating MIMED department records
SearchListSpec.Author: UM Dev

SPSearchList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_UM_USP_SEARCHLIST_UMHSDEPARTMENT ( @NAME nvarchar(100) = null, @MAXROWS smallint = 500 ) as set @NAME = dbo.UFN_SEARCHCRITERIA_GETLIKEPARAMETERVALUE(@NAME, 0, null);
select top(@MAXROWS) ID, NAME from dbo.USR_UMHS_DEPARTMENT where (NAME LIKE @NAME) order by NAME asc
